name: WallGlitcher
description:
This page is still WIP.

DISCLAIMER:

This is a game for 2-4 players as local multiplayer, it‘s desined for controllers (Xbox one, if someone has PS4 plz test it)! BUT there are also some Keyboard controlls but they aren‘t quite as smooth as the one with the controllers!

Wallglitcher is a 2-4 player local multiplayer in which you have to surive the longest, just don‘t fall down. You can fight you‘re friends if you jump on them (yes, in the game too). But the map also fights against you! - I sometimes just wants you to leave, with an hard impuls, or just teleports you around. You can also gain some profit from it, if you use the ability which is sometimes given to a random Player and just kick you‘r mates out even more.

Quick Awsers to questions nobody asked (nFAQ):

1. Which Platforms are supported?

Currently only Windows with 64x and 32x Bit systems.

2. Are you sure that there‘s no Linux or Mac release?

Yes, they both failed buiding, caused by my incompetense to disable the Xinput from the controllers.

3. Is a Linux build planned?

Yes, but I‘m a pro-prograstinator.

4.Which Features does the game have?

Look below the nFAQ to see some features!

5. But will it run Cr… ehm on my PC?

Pretty sure it will, if you have not enough FPS, you can disable PostProcessing in the settings, which gave me a performance boost of 300FPS!

6. Are there any other questions yet?

No, just ask!

Features: Player:

We have up to 4 Players, which are controlled individually by every controller / keyset.

The Players can walk to the left and to the right and also double jump. If you jump on an enemy Player it should boost him to the left or to the right.

Map:

The Map is litterally rotating all the time randomly to the left or to the right.

Currently there are 6 Maps which are randomly changed every 60 seconds.

Events:

There are at the moment seven events, which are called every 5th time after the rotation of the Map.

The chance for every event is 1/7.

They happen with a random text in a white box at the top of the screen.

The Events are:

Random teleport on the Map

Random applyed impuls on all players in a random direction

Teleport exchange with another, random player

Every single part of the map rotates with a random degree value

One randomly choses player get‘s the ability to kick others of the map with a 10m radius circle, lasts 10 seconds

All Players are teleported back to 0,0,0

There‘s a rain which can spawn 500-1000 „balls“ ;) which can kick you of the map as well.
